Title: Requires the provision of notice to mortgagors in default for thirty days or more
Summary: Requires the provision of notice to mortgagors in default for thirty days or more regarding assistance and the necessity of maintaining their residences.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to requiring the provision of notice to mortgagors in default for thirty days or more
